availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert A. Vacaro (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, confectioner and juror)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, confectioner. Kentucky native. Son of Phillip Vacaro and Nancy Vacaro. Resident in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Louisville, Jefferson County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 246B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 9, p. 204A.
